doctor.name: Dr. Md Kutub Uddin Iback
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS, DDV (BSMMU), MACP (USA), EADV (Switzerland),ESPD-Pediatric Dermatology, Diploma in Andrology-UK
doctor.specialty: Skin, Sex, Allergy, Medicine & Diabetes Specialist and Cosmetic Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md Kutub Uddin Iback is a highly qualified specialist with an MBBS, BCS, DDV (BSMMU), MACP (USA), EADV (Switzerland), ESPD in Pediatric Dermatology, a Diploma in Andrology (UK), and a Fellowship in Dermatologic Surgery & Sexual Medicine, along with higher training in Internal Medicine. He is an expert in skin, sex, allergy, medicine, diabetes, and cosmetic surgery. Currently, he serves as a Consultant in Dermatology & Venereology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Iback practices at Pranto Specialized Hospital, located at 67, Charpara, Mymensingh, where he is available for consultations from 3 PM to 9 PM, except on Sundays and Fridays.

chamber.address: Room: 407, Medical College gate, Charpara, Mymensingh
